Assist an ally in need. Remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED">Ensnared</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEB">Enwebbed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">Sleeping</LSTag> from a friendly target.
A successful <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Check</LSTag> will heal a <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag> friendly target for [1], while a failed check will only stabilise them.
You automatically succeed <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag> while outside of combat.

If you reach 0 hit points, you fall Unconscious and must make Death <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. On 3 successes, you stop bleeding out and become Stable. On 3 failures, you die.
If you regain any hit points, the condition is removed. If an ally successfully <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helps</LSTag> you, you regain [1].
When the condition is removed you regain your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>, a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. Additionally, you can regain an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> if you succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
